body_html:
Maybe this comes down just to random seeds? Eager and graph happen to use slightly different random seeds for the weights unless you explicitly pass seeds to the initializer ops.
…

body:
Maybe this comes down just to random seeds? Eager and graph happen to use
slightly different random seeds for the weights unless you explicitly pass
seeds to the initializer ops.

On Mon, Nov 12, 2018 at 7:06 AM Paolo Galeone <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
